name: A Comfortable Burden
description:
The second game from the Nuances series which holds a strong message about feminism, LGBT+ themes or inclusivity.

Commitment

A Comfortable Burden tackles the question of the mental load of domestic chores, coexisting as a couple and everyday life.
Half the income will be donated to the organization Women in Games Fr.

Game

Manage your home, do the housework, take care of the kids… So, quite the ordinary life. A model couple who’s sharing domestic chores, what could be better than that?

But try to keep up the pace! Finish your tasks before the end of the day, the clock is ticking. So it’s up to you to be quick to react if you want to reach the end of the game!

You can play both protagonists in that colorful and enjoyable yet intense series!
